                                                   java.security.cert.CertificateException,
                                                   java.io.IOException,
                                                   java.security.KeyManagementException,
                                                   java.security.UnrecoverableKeyException
        This method returns the appropriate HttpClient.
        Parameters:
        isTLS - Whether Transport Layer Security is required.
        trustStoreInputStream - The InputStream generated from the BKS keystore.
        trustStorePsw - The password related to the keystore.
        Returns:
        The DefaultHttpClient object used to invoke execute(request) method.
        Throws:
        java.security.KeyStoreException
        java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
        java.security.cert.CertificateException
        java.io.IOException
